title: Ruling on french kissing the wife while fasting - Assim al hakeem
transcript: what is the ruling on a person kissing his wife French kissing while they are fasting and this is uh um permissible providing that one ensures that none of the saliva and this is almost impossible to ensure goes into his stomach or her stomach and therefore one should avoid this uh during Ramadan because it would lead to something that may affect your fasting and it's not worth it it's only few hours and then you have the night to do uh any uh uh uh European or German or French uh stuff you would like uh to do
